results.name: Continued fraction for square root of 2Pi.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(sqrt(2*Pi)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b058293.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 31 2009
xref: Cf. A019727 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 31 2009
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
